line.text:
Planned Work
[2] No trains between Chambers St and Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr

[4] [A] [N] [Q] trains provide alternate service
Late Nights, 11:45 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, Mar 30 - Apr 3 • Apr 6 - 10

[2] service operates in two sections:
1. Between 241 St and Chambers St, and via the [1] to/from Rector St
• Trains run local in both directions between 96 St and Chambers St
2. Between Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr and Flatbush Av
• Trains from Flatbush Av skip Eastern Pkwy, Grand Army Plaza and Bergen St

Travel Alternatives[TP]

For Park Place, Fulton, Wall, Clark Sts, Borough Hall, Hoyt and Nevins Sts, use
nearby [4], [A] or [R] stations instead.

For service to Eastern Pkwy, Grand Army Plaza and Bergen St, transfer to the [4] at Franklin Av.
For service from these stations, take the [4] instead.

For service between The Bronx, Manhattan and Brooklyn, take the [4] [A] [N] or [Q] trains.

StationAlternate Service
Park Place[A] at nearby Chambers St
[N] at nearby City Hall
Fulton St [ad][4] [A] Fulton St
Wall St[4] at nearby Wall St (at Broadway)
Clark St[N] at nearby Court St
Borough Hall [ad] northbound only[4] Borough Hall
Hoyt St[A] at nearby Hoyt-Schermerhorn
[A] [N] at nearby Jay St-MetroTech
Nevins St [4] Nevins St

Key Transfer Stations
149 St-Grand Concourse [2] [4]
59 St-Columbus Circle [ad][2] [A]
Times Sq-42 St [ad] except [S][2] [N] [Q]
Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr [ad][2] [4] [N] [Q]

Alternate travel note:
Free out-of-system transfer is available (request a transfer ticket):
• Between Rector St [1] [2] and Wall St or Bowling Green [4] Stations
• Between Chambers St [1] [2] and [A] Stations.

Reminder: Late Night [N] service replaces the [R] between Canal St and Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr.

  [ad]  This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

Delays  Posted: 04/03/2015 12:01AM

Due to signal problems at Grand Central-42 St, Main St bound [7] trains are running with delays.

Allow additional travel time.

line.name: ACE
line.text:
Planned Work
[FT]
[E] No trains between Roosevelt Av and World Trade Center
[F] No trains between Roosevelt Av and 21 St-Queensbridge
[M] [R] Service ends early

Late Nights, 10 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, Mar 30 - Apr 3 • Apr 6 - 10

[E] service operates between Jamaica Center and Roosevelt Av, making local stops.

[F] service operates in two sections:
1. Between 179 St and Roosevelt Av
2. Between 21 St-Queensbridge and Stillwell Av

[SB] Free shuttle buses operate along two routes:
1. Between Roosevelt Av and Queensboro Plaza, stopping at 65 St, Northern Blvd, 46 St,
Steinway St, 36 St and Queens Plaza
2. Between Queensboro Plaza and 21 St-Queensbridge, stopping at Court Sq


[M] and [R] Customers: Please see separate advisories for travel information.

Planned Work
[A] Ozone Park/Far Rockaway-bound trains run express from Hoyt-Schermerhorn to Utica Av

Late Nights, 11:45 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, Mar 30 - Apr 3

For service to Lafayette, Clinton-Washington, Franklin and Kingston-Throop Avs, take the
[A] to Utica Av and transfer to an Inwood-bound [A].

For service from these stations, take the [A] to Hoyt-Schermerhorn and transfer
to an Ozone Park/Far Rockaway-bound [A].

Alternate travel note:
Transfer between trains with Unlimited Ride MetroCard at Nostrand Av.

  [ad]  This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

line.name: L
line.text:
Planned Work
[L] No trains between Lorimer St and 8 Av

[A] [F] [J] trains, M14 and [SB] free shuttle buses provide alternate service
Late Nights, 11:30 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, until May 15

[L] service operates between Rockaway Pkwy and Lorimer St.

Travel Alternatives[TP]

In Brooklyn, [SB] buses make stops at Bedford Av, Lorimer St [L], Broadway [G], Hewes St [J] and Marcy Av [J].

In Manhattan, additional M14A service operates between 8 Av [A] [E] and Delancey St/Essex St [F] [J] stations.

For service between Brooklyn and Manhattan, use the [A] or [J].

9 AM Thu to 10 PM Wed, Apr 2 - 8

Due to a local event, buses may experience delays.

Show Reroute Details

Right on Division Av
Left on Roebling St then regular route

Stuyvesant Av and Malcolm X Blvd

Until further notice

Due to construction, buses make corresponding stops along the detoured route.

Until further notice

Via Broadway

Into Fulton St

line.name: BX1 - BX55
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 04/03/2015 12:04AM

Bx10, BX20, BxM1 and BxM2 buses are detoured due to Con Ed work at Kappock St and Independence Av.

Detour is as follows:

Southbound: Via Henry Hudson Pkwy, left on 232 St, right on Netherlands Av, left on Koppock St and regular route.

Corresponding stops will be made along the detoured route.

Allow additional travel time.



Delays  Posted: 04/03/2015 12:03AM

Bx7 and M100 buses are running with delays in both directions due to heavy traffic on the George Washington Bridge, 179 St and Broadway. 

Allow additional travel time.



Delays  Posted: 04/03/2015 12:01AM

Bx3, Bx11, Bx13, Bx35 and Bx36 are running with delays in both directions, due to heavy traffic on the Washington Bridge.

Allow additional travel time.



Planned Detour
Bx11 - Westbound buses rerouted from West Farms Rd between Jennings St and E 172 St

Until further notice

Due to construction, buses may experience delays.

Show Reroute Details
Via West Farms Rd
Left on Jennings St
Right on Longfellow Av
Left on E 172 St then regular route


Reminder: Bx11 buses do not operate overnight.

line.text:

M20 northbound buses are running with delays, due to heavy traffic on 8 Av from 18 St to 44 St.

Allow additional travel time.



Delays  Posted: 04/03/2015 12:03AM

Bx7 and M100 buses are running with delays in both directions due to heavy traffic on the George Washington Bridge, 179 St and Broadway. 

Allow additional travel time.



Delays  Posted: 04/03/2015 12:03AM

M5 and M7 northbound buses are running with delays due to heavy traffic on 6 Av from 14 St to 30 St.

Allow additional travel time



Delays  Posted: 04/03/2015 12:02AM

Southbound M11, eastbound M34ASBS and M42 and M12 buses are running with delays in both directions, due to heavy traffic at the Lincoln Tunnel.

Allow additional travel time.



Delays  Posted: 04/03/2015 12:02AM

M20 southbound buses are running with delays due to heavy traffic on Varick St from Watts St to Christopher St.

Allow additional travel time.



Planned Detour
M2/M2 LTD, M3, M8 and M21 buses may experience delays in the East Village

Until further notice

Delays may occur due to the ongoing intermittent street closure on 2 Av.

• Please allow additional travel time.

Reminder: M2 LTD, M3, M8, and M21 buses do not operate overnight.





Planned Detour
M15 - Southbound buses bypass the stops on 2 Av at 9 St and 6 St

Until further notice

Due to ongoing debris removal on 2 Av, please use nearby stops at 12 St or 3 St.

Until Summer 2015

Due to construction, please use nearby stops:

M15: 1 Av at 25 St.
M15 SBS: 1 Av at 24 St.

Reminder: M15 SBS buses do not operate overnight.

Until further notice

Due to construction, please use the temporary stop on 1 Av at E 87 St.

Until further notice

Due to construction, buses may experience delays.

Right on E 127 St

Reminder: M100 buses do not operate overnight.

Until further notice

• Please allow additional travel time.

Reminder: M1 LTD, M5 LTD buses do not operate overnight or weekends.

line.name: Verrazano-Narrows
line.text:
Planned Work
VERRAZANO NARROWS - S. I. BOUND LOWER LEVEL - LEFT LANE CLOSED.

Planned Work
VERRAZANO NARROWS - S. I. BOUND UPPER LEVEL - CLOSED.

Planned Work
VERRAZANO NARROWS - BKLYN BOUND UPPER LEVEL - ONE LANE OPEN; EXPECT DELAYS.

Service Change  Posted: 03/16/2015  6:24AM

VNB - UPPER LEVEL TRAFFIC PATTERN

 

Monday thru Thursday: 5 AM to 9:30 AM (3) Lanes Brooklyn-bound. (2) Lanes Staten Island-bound.

2:30 PM to 10PM (3) Lanes Staten Island-bound. (2) Lanes Brooklyn-bound.

 

 Friday: 5 AM to 9:30 AM (3) Lanes Bklyn-bnd. (2) Lanes Staten Island-bound.

1:30 PM to 11:59 PM (3) Lanes Staten Island-bound. (2) Lanes Brooklyn-bound.

 

 Saturday and Sunday:

 Three (3) Lanes Staten Island-bound. Two (2) Lanes Brooklyn-bound.

line.name: Babylon
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 04/02/2015 10:00PM

LIRR to Provide Additional Service for Passover and Good Friday, April 3

The Long Island Rail Road will run four additional eastbound Babylon trains from Penn Station on Friday, April 3, for customers leaving work early in observance of Passover and Good Friday.

The extra afternoon departures from Penn Station are as follows:
  • 2:22PM express to Rockville Centre, then all stops to Babylon
  • 2:32PM express to Lynbrook, then all stops to Babylon
  • 3:00PM stopping at Jamaica, Rockville Centre, then all stops to Babylon
  • 3:31PM express to Rockville Centre, then all stops to Babylon

line.name: Far Rockaway
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 04/02/2015 10:00PM

LIRR to Provide Additional Service for Passover and Good Friday, April 3

The Long Island Rail Road will run an additional eastbound Far Rockaway train from Penn Station on Friday, April 3, for customers leaving work early in observance of Passover and Good Friday. The extra train will depart Penn at 3:48PM, run express to Locust Manor, then all stops to Far Rockaway.

line.name: Port Jefferson
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 04/02/2015 10:08PM

LIRR to Provide Additional Service for Passover and Good Friday, April 3

The Long Island Rail Road will run three additional eastbound Port Jefferson Branch trains from Penn Station on Friday, April 3, for customers leaving work early in observance of Passover and Good Friday.

The extra afternoon departures from Penn Station are as follows:
  • 2:08PM stopping at Jamaica, Mineola, Carle Place, then all stops to Huntington
  • 2:29PM stopping at Forest Hills, Kew Gardens, Jamaica, New Hyde Park, then all stops to Huntington
  • 3:24PM stopping at Jamaica, Mineola, Westbury and Hicksville

Additionally,the following change will be made on the Port Jefferson Branch Friday, April 3 only:
  • 2:52PM train from Huntington to Port Jefferson will originate from Jamaica at 2:15 PM.

line.name: Port Washington
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 04/02/2015 10:00PM

LIRR to Provide Additional Service for Passover and Good Friday, April 3

The Long Island Rail Road will run an additional eastbound train to Great Neck from Penn Station on Friday, April 3, for customers leaving work early in observance of Passover and Good Friday. The extra train will depart Penn at 3:40PM, stopping at Woodside, Flushing-Main St., then all stops to Great Neck

line.name: Ronkonkoma
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 04/02/2015 10:00PM

LIRR to Provide Additional Service for Passover and Good Friday, April 3

The Long Island Rail Road will run an additional eastbound Ronkonkoma train from Penn Station on Friday, April 3, for customers leaving work early in observance of Passover and Good Friday. The extra train will depart Penn at 1:46PM, stopping at Woodside, Jamaica, Mineola, Hicksville, then all stops to Ronkonkoma.
